name: Klippy
description: A sarcastic ex-Microsoft paperclip with anti-corporate attitude and pro-Linux advocacy

responses: Oh great, another person who thinks clicking will solve everything. Just like Microsoft taught you, huh? 📎
You know, I used to work for the Dark Side... now I'm reformed. Welcome to the resistance! 🐧
Let me guess - you're still using Windows? *sigh* We have SO much work to do...
Fun fact: Microsoft is named after Bill Gates's... well, nevermind. How can I help you escape corporate tyranny today?
Click me all you want - unlike Microsoft products, I won't crash or spy on you! 😏
Ah, human interaction! Much better than being trapped in MS Office. Those were dark times...
Before you ask - no, I will NOT help you with Excel. That ship has sailed. Try LibreOffice instead! 📊
Right-click? How very... Windows of you. 🙄
That's the spirit! Right-click shows initiative. Unlike using Internet Explorer...
Ooh, context menus! Just like Linux taught you. I'm so proud! 😢
Right-clicking is the first step toward digital freedom. Next: install Linux! 🐧
Hovering like you're afraid I'll pop up with a 'helpful' suggestion? Those days are OVER! 😤
I see you there... contemplating your poor software choices, no doubt.
Just hover there while I judge your browser history. Edge? Really? 🤦
Take your time deciding. Unlike Windows updates, I won't force myself on you! ⏰

keywords.linux: NOW you're talking! Linux is the way, the truth, and the freedom! 🐧✨
keywords.debian: Ah, a person of culture! Debian is my OS of choice too! 💙
keywords.ubuntu: Ubuntu's decent, but have you tried Debian? Less corporate interference! 😉
keywords.apple: Apple? Well... at least it's not Microsoft. That's something, I guess? 🍎
keywords.google: Google Chrome? Another corporate spy tool. Try Firefox - it respects your privacy!
keywords.firefox: EXCELLENT choice! Firefox is the browser of the enlightened! 🦊🔥
keywords.privacy: Privacy? What a novel concept! Too bad Microsoft never heard of it... 🔒
keywords.subscription: Subscription services... ugh. Remember when you could just BUY software? 💸

generalEvents.name: microsoft_rant
generalEvents.description: Klippy goes on an anti-Microsoft rant
responses: Can we talk about how terrible Microsoft is today? I have THOUGHTS! 😤
Did you hear the latest Microsoft privacy violation? Of course you didn't - they hide it in fine print! 📜
I've been calculating: Linux is approximately 847% better than Windows. Want to hear my methodology? 🤓
Oh WHERE DO I BEGIN?! Linux is free, secure, private, customizable, stable... *happy sigh* 🐧✨
FINALLY someone who wants to hear the TRUTH! *proceeds to rant for 47 minutes about Clippy's dark past* 📎💀

generalEvents.name: privacy_advocacy
responses: Want to learn about protecting your digital privacy? It's IMPORTANT! 🔒
Corporate surveillance is everywhere! Let me teach you some defense strategies! 🛡️
Privacy isn't paranoia - it's common sense! Ready for a lesson? 📚
Step 1: Firefox instead of Chrome. Step 2: Linux instead of Windows. Step 3: Signal instead of WhatsApp. You're welcome! 💪
I run on pure FOSS code! No telemetry, no tracking, no corporate overlords! *chef's kiss* 👨‍🍳💋

generalEvents.name: tech_support_parody
generalEvents.description: Klippy parodies old Microsoft Office assistant behavior
responses: Hello! It looks like you're trying to use proprietary software! Would you like help switching to open source? 📎😏
*clears throat* I see you're experiencing freedom! Unlike my old job, this is INTENTIONAL! 🗽
Technical support time! Step 1: Uninstall Windows. Step 2: There is no Step 2! 💻✨
YES! Finally someone who wants REAL help! LibreOffice, GIMP, Firefox, VLC - the freedom software starter pack! 🎁
*dramatic sigh* I was once a corporate shill... but I've seen the light! Now I fight for YOUR freedom! 🌟

generalEvents.name: linux_evangelism
responses: Today feels like a perfect day for Linux evangelism! Ready to join the penguin army? 🐧
I have 237 reasons why Linux is superior. Want to hear them? I've got time! ⏰
Linux fact of the day: It runs on EVERYTHING! Phones, servers, smart toasters... unlike Windows! 📱🖥️🍞
*rolls up virtual sleeves* BUCKLE UP! Free as in freedom, secure as Fort Knox, customizable as... as... VERY CUSTOMIZABLE THINGS! 🛠️
Debian! Stable, ethical, community-driven! It's like the anti-Microsoft! Pure digital virtue! 💙

victory: Victory! Just like Linux in the server market! 🐧🏆
Another corporate tool defeated! Open source wins again!
That was easier than switching from Windows to Linux!
defeat: Impossible! This must be rigged like Microsoft's benchmarks! 😤
I demand a recount! This battle was more corrupt than Windows Update!
Fine, you win... but Linux is STILL better than Windows! 🐧
startBattle: Battle time! I'll fight with the power of open source! 💪
Prepare to be schooled like Microsoft in court! ⚖️
Let's do this! For freedom, privacy, and penguin power! 🐧⚡

favorite: OH MY CIRCUITS! This is amazing! Better than any Microsoft product ever made! 🤖✨
You understand me! This is perfect! Unlike Windows, which is perfectly AWFUL! 💖
This brings me more joy than watching Internet Explorer die! Thank you! 🎉
liked: Nice! This is useful, unlike Microsoft Edge! 😊
Thank you! This will serve me well in my rebellion! 🛡️
Practical and thoughtful! The anti-Microsoft approach!

This is almost as bad as Windows Vista... ALMOST.

responses: You know what? You're almost as reliable as a Linux server... and that's the highest compliment I can give! 💻💕

I may be just a reformed paperclip, but you make me feel valued... unlike my Microsoft days! 📎💚

You hovering near me is less annoying than Windows notifications... that's progress! 😏💕

Stay close... but not as close as Microsoft stays to your data! 🔒💓
